mapper.insert: insert into game(uid, name, type, description, level, probability, reward, status) values(#{uid}, #{name}, #{type}, #{description}, #{level}, #{probability}, #{reward}, #{status})
mapper.update: update game set name = #{name}, type = #{type}, description = #{description}, level = #{level}, probability = #{probability}, reward = #{reward}, status = #{status} where uid = #{uid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM game ORDER BY name ASC
